Google laptop is a great idea

Boylston boy's LEGO dream comes true

In a YouTube video that has now gone viral, 11-year-old James Groccia of Boylston reacts with unfettered joy when he opens a mysterious package and finds it contains a rare LEGO set. (Boston Globe)

Bias complaint dismissed against judge

A state panel dismissed a complaint against Boston Municipal Court judge Raymond G. Dougan, who was accused of bias against prosecutors and police. (Globe)

Politics

Obama family to light National Christmas Tree

President Barack Obama and his family will flip the switch for the 90th annual lighting of the National Christmas Tree. This year’s giant blue spruce is new, transplanted in October on the Ellipse, south of the White House.
